trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Hudson
There were no other sightings in Hudson on or around September 26th 2013
Summary: I notice the moon was still visible at noon time thats way looked up then i saw the object darted into a cloud.
divs: Sighting Details I was on my way to have late breakfast at around 12:30pm or so ( not working that day ) when I notices the moon was still visible as a very light white shade that's way I looked up when I notice an object like a sphere that came very fast from my wright view on a none linear path to the left a bit wavy and very fast it darted into a cloud where it apparently stay as looking for cover I pulled over and waited for 5 minutes but nothing... I could not believe my eyes since I just witness something the day before this was different not glowing no lights just dark colors uneven black and dark grey.
